20  struct InAppPurchase {
21  string transactionId;
22  string productId;
23  uint64_t purchaseDate;
24  int32_t quantity;
25  };

27  class InAppPurchaseObserver;

29  enum class InAppProvider {
30  AUTO,
31  APP_STORE,
32  GOOGLE_PLAY,
33  AMAZON_APPSTORE,
34 
35  };
36 
37  class InAppService {
38  public:
39  struct Error {
40  Error() : code(0) {};
41  int32_t code;
42  string message;
43  inline bool empty() const { return code == 0 && message.empty();}
44  };
45  typedef std::function<void(const std::vector<InAppProduct> & products, const InAppService::Error & error)> FetchCallback;
46  typedef std::function<void(const InAppService::Error & error)> RestoreCallback;
47  typedef std::function<void(const InAppPurchase & purchase, const InAppService::Error & error)> PurchaseCallback;
48  typedef std::function<void(int32_t consumed, const InAppService::Error & error)> ConsumeCallback;
49  typedef std::function<void(const InAppService::Error & error)> ValidationCompletion;
50  typedef std::function<void(const string & receipt, const string & productId, const ValidationCompletion & completion)>ValidationHandler;
51 
52  static InAppService * create(InAppProvider provider = InAppProvider::AUTO);
53  static InAppService * create(const char * className);
54  virtual ~InAppService() {};
55  virtual void addPurchaseObserver(InAppPurchaseObserver * observer) = 0;
56  virtual void removePurchaseObserver(InAppPurchaseObserver * observer) = 0;
57  virtual void start() = 0;
58  virtual void fetchProducts(const std::vector<string> & productIds, const FetchCallback & callback) = 0;
59  virtual std::vector<InAppProduct> getProducts() const = 0;
60  virtual void mapProductIds(const std::map<string, string> & productsMap) = 0;
61  virtual bool productForId(const string & productId, InAppProduct * product) const = 0;
62  virtual bool isPurchased(const string & productId) const = 0;
63  virtual int32_t stockOfProduct(const string & productId) = 0;
64  virtual void restorePurchases(const RestoreCallback & callback) = 0;
65  virtual bool canPurchase() const = 0;
66  virtual void purchase(const string & productId, int32_t quantity, const PurchaseCallback & callback) = 0;
67  inline void purchase(const string & productId, const PurchaseCallback & callback) {
68  purchase(productId, 1, callback);
69  }
70  virtual void consume(const string & productId, int32_t quantity, const ConsumeCallback & callback) = 0;
71  virtual void finishPurchase(const string & transactionId) = 0;
72  virtual void setValidationHandler(const ValidationHandler & handler) = 0;
73  virtual void setLudeiServerValidationHandler() = 0;
74  };
75 
76  class InAppPurchaseObserver {
77  public:
78  virtual void purchaseStarted(InAppService * service, const string & productId) = 0;
79  virtual void purchaseFailed(InAppService * service, const string & productId, const InAppService::Error & error) = 0;
80  virtual void purchaseCompleted(InAppService * service, const InAppPurchase & purchase) = 0;
81  };
82 
83 } }
